document_data.name: ''Tombsweeper''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Tombsweeper''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[morning star]] that crushed many [[undead]] creatures in its past.
{{quote|''After the hundredth [[skeleton]], what's to be afraid of? They all march at you like [[horse]]s to water, and you just hack them down one at a time. I'm supposed to be scared of that?''|[[Seldon Mirai]]}}
document_data.History:
Sometime before [[1281 DR]], ''Tombsweeper'' belonged to a humorous fighter named [[Seldon Mirai]], who felt no fear in the face of the undead. He was known to carelessly stroll into undead-infested tombs, making jokes and smashing shambling dead with the ''Tombsweeper''. Eventually, his attitude towards [[necromancer]]s' creations attracted the ire of a powerful [[lich]] called [[Tiron]]. The irked lich placed a [[paralyze|paralyzing]] curse on the warrior and ordering his skeletons to clobber him to death. Later, Tiron, ironically, raised Seldon Mirai as one of his mindless servants.

By [[1281 DR]], ''Tombsweeper'' ended up in the possession of the blacksmith [[Conlan]] in [[Kuldahar]].
